#get R's PID RPID=$(ps aw | grep '[0-9] /Lib.*TMRdaemon' | awk '{print $1;}' )
#check whether Rdaemon runs - if not start it if [ -z $RPID ]; then
if [ -f "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh ]; then rm -rf "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon rm -rf "$HOME"/Rdaemon/help cp -R "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT"/Rdaemon/daemon "$HOME"/Rdaemon cp -R "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT"/Rdaemon/help "$HOME"/Rdaemon "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh echo -en "> " else [[ -d "$HOME"/Rdaemon ]] && echo -e "The folder '$HOME/Rdaemon' already exists! Please remove or rename it first." && exit_show_tool_tip cp -R "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT"/Rdaemon "$HOME"/Rdaemon echo -e "Rdaemon was installed in:\n'$HOME/Rdaemon'" if [ -f "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh ]; then "$HOME"/Rdaemon/daemon/startScript.sh echo -en "> " else echo "Error while installing Rdaemon!" exit_show_tool_tip fi fi
else echo -n "> " fi
open "$HOME"/Rdaemon/Rsession.tmproj mate "$HOME"/Rdaemon/console.Rcon open "txmt://open?line=1000000&column=10000000"
